description: The objects in this section represent the high level objects within the program. Access to the program normally starts with the VectricJob, and from there you can access the layers holding all the geometry and the current selection state for the job.

classes.name: MaterialBlock
classes.documentation: This object represents the material block within the program. It holds the width, height and thickness of the job and also the XY and Z origins. There is a single instance of the material block in the program. A number of methods are provided to convert between 'absolute' z values and z values relative to the surface of the material.

constructors.label: MaterialBlock()
constructors.documentation: A new object which refers to the single material block within the program.

properties.name: ActualXYOrigin
properties.documentation: XY position for user specified origin position on material (see .XYOrigin)

properties.name: BlcOrigin
properties.documentation: XYZ position for bottom left corner of material block

properties.name: Height
properties.documentation: Height of material - length in Y

properties.name: InMM
properties.documentation: True if the job is in MM else it is in inches

properties.name: MaterialBox
properties.documentation: The 3D bounding box for the material

properties.name: MaterialSurfaceZ
properties.documentation: Z value for surface of material

properties.name: Thickness
properties.documentation: Thickness of material - length in Z

properties.name: Width
properties.documentation: Width of material - length in X

properties.name: CylinderDiameter
properties.documentation: (Rotary Only) The diameter of the material cylinder

properties.name: CylinderLength
properties.documentation: (Rotary Only) The length of the material cylinder

properties.name: XYOrigin
properties.documentation: Value indicating position in material chosen as XY origin. Valid values: MaterialBlock.BLC, MaterialBlock.BRC, MaterialBlock.TRC, MaterialBlock.TLC, MaterialBlock.CENTRE

properties.name: ZOrigin
properties.documentation: Value indicating position of Z origin. Valid values: MaterialBlock.Z_TOP, MaterialBlock.Z_CENTRE, MaterialBlock.Z_BOTTOM

properties.name: FlipDirection
properties.documentation: (Double-Sided Only) Values indicating how we flip the material in a two sided job. Valid values: VectricJob.AROUND_X, VectricJob.AROUND_Y

properties.name: JobType
properties.documentation: Values indicating the type of the current job. Valid values: MaterialBlock.SINGLE_SIDED, MaterialBlock.DOUBLE_SIDED, MaterialBlock.ROTARY

properties.name: RotationAxis
properties.documentation: (Rotary Only) Values indicating the rotation axis of the cylinder. Valid values: MaterialBlock.X_AXIS, MaterialBlock.Y_AXIS

methods.name: CalcAbsoluteZ
methods.documentation: Returns an 'absolute' z value from a z value relative to the surface of the block. Z_value can be negative for values below the surface or positive for values above the surface.

signature.label: CalcAbsoluteZ(z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Returns an 'absolute' z value from a z value relative to the surface of the block.

parameters.label: z_value
parameters.documentation: z_value: number - z value relative to surface of material

methods.name: CalcAbsoluteZFromDepth
methods.documentation: Returns an absolute z value from a depth value below the surface.

signature.label: CalcAbsoluteZFromDepth(z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Returns an absolute z value from a depth value below the surface.

parameters.label: z_value
parameters.documentation: z_value: number - depth value

methods.name: CalcDepthFromAbsoluteZ
methods.documentation: Returns a depth below the surface of the material from an absolute z value.

signature.label: CalcDepthFromAbsoluteZ(z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Returns a depth below the surface of the material from an absolute z value.

parameters.label: z_value
parameters.documentation: z_value: number - absolute z value

methods.name: SideZOrigin
methods.documentation: Similar to .ZOrigin, but for the given side

signature.label: SideZOrigin(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Similar to .ZOrigin, but for the given side

parameters.label: side_id
parameters.documentation: side_id: UUID

methods.name: SideMaterialSurfaceZ
methods.documentation: Similar to .MaterialSurfaceZ for the given side

signature.label: SideMaterialSurfaceZ(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Similar to .MaterialSurfaceZ for the given side

parameters.label: side_id
parameters.documentation: side_id: UUID

methods.name: SideMaterialBox
methods.documentation: Similar to .MaterialBox for the given side

signature.label: SideMaterialBox(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Similar to .MaterialBox for the given side

parameters.label: side_id
parameters.documentation: side_id: UUID

methods.name: SideBlcOrigin
methods.documentation: Similar to .BlcOrigin for the given side

signature.label: SideBlcOrigin(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Similar to .BlcOrigin for the given side

parameters.label: side_id
parameters.documentation: side_id: UUID

methods.name: CalcSideAbsoluteZ
methods.documentation: Similar to CalcAbsoluteZ() for the given side

signature.label: CalcSideAbsoluteZ(side_id: UUID, z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Similar to CalcAbsoluteZ() for the given side

parameters.label: side_id
parameters.documentation: side_id: UUID

parameters.label: z_value
parameters.documentation: z_value: number

methods.name: CalcSideDepthFromAbsoluteZ
methods.documentation: Similar to CalcDepthFromAbsoluteZ() for the given side

signature.label: CalcSideDepthFromAbsoluteZ(side_id: UUID, z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Similar to CalcDepthFromAbsoluteZ() for the given side

parameters.label: side_id
parameters.documentation: side_id: UUID

parameters.label: z_value
parameters.documentation: z_value: number

methods.name: CalcSideAbsoluteZFromDepth
methods.documentation: Similar to CalcAbsoluteZFromDepth() for the given side

signature.label: CalcSideAbsoluteZFromDepth(side_id: UUID, depth: number)
signature.documentation: Similar to CalcAbsoluteZFromDepth() for the given side

parameters.label: side_id
parameters.documentation: side_id: UUID

parameters.label: depth
parameters.documentation: depth: number

classes.name: VectricJob
classes.documentation: This is the main object a script writer will interact with and represents the currently open job (file) within the application. There are members of the object which will tell you if there is an existing job open and also to allow you to create a new job.

constructors.label: VectricJob()
constructors.documentation: Creates a reference to the currently open job. Use the .Exists property to check if a job is actually loaded.

properties.name: Exists
properties.documentation: Returns true if there is an existing job open

properties.name: DocumentVariables
properties.documentation: Returns the DocumentVariableList for the job. The variable list allows for user defined values to be used in formulas.

properties.name: Height
properties.documentation: Returns height of the job along Y axis (same as YLength)

properties.name: IsAspire
properties.documentation: Returns true if the script is running inside Aspire

properties.name: IsBetaBuild
properties.documentation: Returns true if this is a Beta build rather than a release build

properties.name: InInches
properties.documentation: Returns true if the current units are inches

properties.name: InMM
properties.documentation: Returns true if the current units are mm

properties.name: JobParameters
properties.documentation: Returns the utParameterList for the job. The parameter list allows scripts to store persistent data with the job.

properties.name: LayerManager
properties.documentation: Returns the CadLayerManager for the job. This manages all the layers which in turn hold all the vector objects in the job.

properties.name: MinX
properties.documentation: Returns X coordinate of bottom left corner of job

properties.name: MinY
properties.documentation: Returns Y coordinate of bottom left corner of job

properties.name: Name
properties.documentation: Returns the name of the current job WITHOUT the file extension (e.g. 'test' not 'test.crv')

properties.name: PostProcessorParameters
properties.documentation: Returns the utParameterList for the last run of a post processor. This will hold information such as the PostP used, the tools used and the actual toolpath files output.

properties.name: Selection
properties.documentation: Returns the SelectionList for the currently selected vectors in the job

properties.name: SheetManager
properties.documentation: Returns the CadSheetManager for the job. This manages all the sheets in the job.

properties.name: Width
properties.documentation: Returns width of the job along X axis (same as XLength)

properties.name: XLength
properties.documentation: Returns length of the job along X axis (same as Width)

properties.name: YLength
properties.documentation: Returns length of the job along Y axis (same as Height)

methods.name: ClearClipboard
methods.documentation: Clear any data on the clipboard

signature.label: ClearClipboard()
signature.documentation: Clear any data on the clipboard

methods.name: CreateHorizontalGuide
methods.documentation: Create a horizontal guide at the specified Y position

signature.label: CreateHorizontalGuide(y_value: number, locked: boolean)
signature.documentation: Create a horizontal guide

parameters.label: y_value
parameters.documentation: y_value: number - Y value for guide position

parameters.label: locked
parameters.documentation: locked: boolean - if true guide is locked

methods.name: CopyToClipboard
methods.documentation: Copies passed text to clipboard. Returns true if copied to clipboard OK else false.

signature.label: CopyToClipboard(text: string)
signature.documentation: Copies passed text to clipboard

parameters.label: text
parameters.documentation: text: string - text to put on clipboard

methods.name: CreateVerticalGuide
methods.documentation: Create a vertical guide at the specified X position

signature.label: CreateVerticalGuide(x_value: number, locked: boolean)
signature.documentation: Create a vertical guide

parameters.label: x_value
parameters.documentation: x_value: number - X value for guide position

parameters.label: locked
parameters.documentation: locked: boolean - if true guide is locked

methods.name: DisplayToolpathPreviewForm
methods.documentation: Display the toolpath preview form for simulation

signature.label: DisplayToolpathPreviewForm()
signature.documentation: Display the toolpath preview form for simulation

methods.name: ExportSelectionToEps
methods.documentation: Exports selected vectors to passed path as an EPS file. Returns true if data exported OK else false.

signature.label: ExportSelectionToEps(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Exports selected vectors to EPS file

parameters.label: pathname
parameters.documentation: pathname: string - path to output file

methods.name: ExportSelectionToDxf
methods.documentation: Exports selected vectors to passed path as a DXF file. Returns true if data exported OK else false.

signature.label: ExportSelectionToDxf(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Exports selected vectors to DXF file

parameters.label: pathname
parameters.documentation: pathname: string - path to output file

methods.name: ExportSelectionToSvg
methods.documentation: Exports selected vectors to passed path as a SVG file. Returns true if data exported OK else false.

signature.label: ExportSelectionToSvg(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Exports selected vectors to SVG file

parameters.label: pathname
parameters.documentation: pathname: string - path to output file

methods.name: ExportDocumentVariables
methods.documentation: Exports the job's DocumentVariableList to passed path as an INI file.

signature.label: ExportDocumentVariables(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Exports document variables to INI file

parameters.label: pathname
parameters.documentation: pathname: string - path to output file

methods.name: GetBuildVersion
methods.documentation: Returns application internal build version same for Aspire and VCarve Pro (e.g. 7.004 for Aspire 4.004 which matches VCarve Pro 7.004)

signature.label: GetBuildVersion()
signature.documentation: Returns application internal build version

methods.name: GetBounds
methods.documentation: Return the 2D bounding box for the drawing area

signature.label: GetBounds()
signature.documentation: Return the 2D bounding box for the drawing area

methods.name: GetAppVersion
methods.documentation: Returns application version number as a double (e.g. 4.004 for Aspire V4.0)

signature.label: GetAppVersion()
signature.documentation: Returns application version number

methods.name: GetWrapDiameter
methods.documentation: Returns wrap diameter for a wrapped model

signature.label: GetWrapDiameter()
signature.documentation: Returns wrap diameter for a wrapped model

methods.name: GroupSelection
methods.documentation: Returns true if the current selection could be grouped

signature.label: GroupSelection()
signature.documentation: Groups the current selection if possible

methods.name: GuidesVisible
methods.documentation: Returns true if guides are visible else false

signature.label: GuidesVisible()
signature.documentation: Check if guides are visible

methods.name: ImportBitmap
methods.documentation: Imports a bitmap from passed path. Returns true if file imported OK else false.

signature.label: ImportBitmap(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Imports a bitmap file

parameters.label: pathname
parameters.documentation: pathname: string - path to bitmap file

methods.name: ImportDxfDwg
methods.documentation: Imports a DXF or DWG file from passed path. Returns true if file imported OK else false. NOTE: after data is imported it is selected.

signature.label: ImportDxfDwg(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Imports a DXF or DWG file

parameters.label: pathname
parameters.documentation: pathname: string - path to DXF/DWG file

methods.name: ImportSTLDirect
methods.documentation: Directly import (without orientation form) an STL with passed path - automatically creates a component. Returns true if file imported OK else false. NOTE: Aspire only

signature.label: ImportSTLDirect(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Imports an STL file directly (Aspire only)

parameters.label: pathname
parameters.documentation: pathname: string - path to STL file

methods.name: ImportSVG
methods.documentation: Import an SVG file with the given path and creates the vectors and layers. Returns true if the file was imported with no issues, otherwise returns false.

signature.label: ImportSVG(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Imports an SVG file

parameters.label: pathname
parameters.documentation: pathname: string - path to SVG file

methods.name: ImportDocumentVariables
methods.documentation: Imports a DocumentVariableList from the passed path. Please note that any existing variables will be overwritten.

signature.label: ImportDocumentVariables(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Imports document variables from INI file

parameters.label: pathname
parameters.documentation: pathname: string - path to INI file

methods.name: IsWrappedModel
methods.documentation: Return true if this is a wrapped model

signature.label: IsWrappedModel()
signature.documentation: Check if this is a wrapped model

methods.name: MoveObjectToSheet
methods.documentation: Moves the passed object to the sheet with the passed id. For details of how to access the sheet ids see CadSheetManager.

signature.label: MoveObjectToSheet(object: CadObject, sheet_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Moves an object to a different sheet

parameters.label: object
parameters.documentation: object: CadObject - object to move

parameters.label: sheet_id
parameters.documentation: sheet_id: UUID - target sheet ID

methods.name: Refresh2DView
methods.documentation: Refreshes the 2D view. Call this after you have created or modified geometry to update the 2D view.

signature.label: Refresh2DView()
signature.documentation: Refreshes the 2D view

methods.name: SelectAllVectors
methods.documentation: Returns true if all vectors in the current job could be selected

signature.label: SelectAllVectors()
signature.documentation: Selects all vectors in the job

methods.name: SetGuidesVisible
methods.documentation: Set visibility of guides

signature.label: SetGuidesVisible(visible: boolean)
signature.documentation: Set visibility of guides

parameters.label: visible
parameters.documentation: visible: boolean - true if guides visible else false

methods.name: SetXY_Origin
methods.detail: (origin: XYOrigin, x_offset: number, y_offset: number) → boolean
methods.documentation: Set the 2D origin for the job. Returns true if origin set OK else false. NOTE: no data is moved by this call!

signature.label: SetXY_Origin(origin: XYOrigin, x_offset: number, y_offset: number)
signature.documentation: Set the 2D origin for the job

parameters.label: origin
parameters.documentation: origin: XYOrigin - the four corners or the centre

parameters.label: x_offset
parameters.documentation: x_offset: number - distance in X of specified point from 0,0

parameters.label: y_offset
parameters.documentation: y_offset: number - distance in Y of specified point from 0,0

methods.name: UnGroupSelection
methods.documentation: Returns true if the current selection could be ungrouped

signature.label: UnGroupSelection(deep_ungroup: boolean, preserve_orig_layers: boolean)
signature.documentation: Ungroups the current selection

parameters.label: deep_ungroup
parameters.documentation: deep_ungroup: boolean - if true ungroup Groups recursively

parameters.label: preserve_orig_layers
parameters.documentation: preserve_orig_layers: boolean - if true preserve the original object layers

methods.name: WrappingXValues
methods.documentation: Return true if we are wrapping X values - else wrapping Y values

signature.label: WrappingXValues()
signature.documentation: Check if wrapping X values

methods.name: WrapZOnSurface
methods.documentation: Returns true if Z for wrap is on surface of material, else in centre

signature.label: WrapZOnSurface()
signature.documentation: Check if wrap Z is on surface

methods.name: SwitchActiveSide
methods.documentation: Switch the current side and make the opposite side active (double-sided jobs only)

signature.label: SwitchActiveSide()
signature.documentation: Switch to opposite side

methods.name: SetActiveSide
methods.documentation: Set the current side to be that of the given UUID (double-sided jobs only)

signature.label: SetActiveSide(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Set active side by ID

parameters.label: side_id
parameters.documentation: side_id: UUID - ID of side to activate

methods.name: GetSideList
methods.documentation: Return UUID_List with the list of side UUIDs. This is useful for iterating over the sides in double-sided jobs.

signature.label: GetSideList()
signature.documentation: Get list of side IDs

methods.name: GetActiveSideId
methods.documentation: Return the current side's UUID

signature.label: GetActiveSideId()
signature.documentation: Get active side ID

methods.name: GetSideName
methods.documentation: Return a string with the name of the given side

signature.label: GetSideName(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Get side name by ID

parameters.label: side_id
parameters.documentation: side_id: UUID - ID of side

methods.name: CopySelectionToOppositeSide
methods.documentation: Copy the selected vectors and components to the opposite side and flip them (double-sided jobs only)

signature.label: CopySelectionToOppositeSide()
signature.documentation: Copy selection to opposite side

methods.name: MoveSelectionToOppositeSide
methods.documentation: Move the selected vectors and components to the opposite side and flip them (double-sided jobs only)

signature.label: MoveSelectionToOppositeSide()
signature.documentation: Move selection to opposite side

methods.name: SideComponentManager
methods.documentation: Return the ComponentManager for the side which has the given UUID. If you just require the component manager of the current side, you can use the .ComponentManager property instead.

signature.label: SideComponentManager(side_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Get ComponentManager for specific side

parameters.label: side_id
parameters.documentation: side_id: UUID - ID of side

methods.name: IsSingleSided
methods.documentation: Return true if we have a job and it's single-sided

signature.label: IsSingleSided()
signature.documentation: Check if job is single-sided

methods.name: IsDoubleSided
methods.documentation: Return true if we have a job and it's double-sided

signature.label: IsDoubleSided()
signature.documentation: Check if job is double-sided

constants.name: AROUND_X
constants.value: Flip material around X axis (for double-sided jobs)

constants.name: AROUND_Y
constants.value: Flip material around Y axis (for double-sided jobs)

classes.name: SelectionList
classes.documentation: This object holds a list of CadObjects representing the current selection in the program. The selection is accessed via the job using job.Selection property. SelectionList provides methods to add, remove, and manipulate selected objects.

properties.name: Count
properties.documentation: Returns the number of objects in the selection list

properties.name: IsEmpty
properties.documentation: Returns true if the selection list is empty (no objects selected)

methods.name: Add
methods.detail: (obj: CadObject, add_tail: boolean, group_add: boolean) → void
methods.documentation: Add the passed object to the selection list. If you are adding many objects, set group_add to true and call GroupSelectionFinished() when done to avoid unnecessary updating.

signature.label: Add(obj: CadObject, add_tail: boolean, group_add: boolean)
signature.documentation: Add object to selection list

parameters.label: obj
parameters.documentation: obj: CadObject - object to add to selection

parameters.label: add_tail
parameters.documentation: add_tail: boolean - if true add to end of selection, else insert at start

parameters.label: group_add
parameters.documentation: group_add: boolean - if true, defer updates until GroupSelectionFinished() is called

methods.name: AddHead
methods.documentation: Add the passed object to the front of the selection list

signature.label: AddHead(obj: CadObject)
signature.documentation: Add object to front of selection

parameters.label: obj
parameters.documentation: obj: CadObject - object to add

methods.name: AddTail
methods.documentation: Add the passed object to the end of the selection list

signature.label: AddTail(obj: CadObject)
signature.documentation: Add object to end of selection

parameters.label: obj
parameters.documentation: obj: CadObject - object to add

methods.name: CanTransform
methods.documentation: Return true if selection can be transformed. Flags can be combined (e.g., 3 = Move + Rotate). 1=Move, 2=Rotate, 4=Mirror, 8=Scale Symmetric, 16=Scale Asymmetric

signature.label: CanTransform(flags: number)
signature.documentation: Check if selection can be transformed

parameters.label: flags
parameters.documentation: flags: number - transform type flags (1=Move, 2=Rotate, 4=Mirror, 8=Scale Symmetric, 16=Scale Asymmetric)

methods.name: CanSelect
methods.documentation: Return true if the passed object can be selected

signature.label: CanSelect(obj: CadObject)
signature.documentation: Check if object can be selected

parameters.label: obj
parameters.documentation: obj: CadObject - object to test

methods.name: Clear
methods.documentation: Clear the selection (list is emptied, all objects deselected)

signature.label: Clear()
signature.documentation: Clear the selection

methods.name: GetAt
methods.documentation: Returns the object at the current position in the list

signature.label: GetAt(pos: POSITION)
signature.documentation: Get object at position

parameters.label: pos
parameters.documentation: pos: POSITION - current position in list

methods.name: GetBoundingBox
methods.documentation: Return a Box2D with the bounds of all selected objects

signature.label: GetBoundingBox()
signature.documentation: Get bounding box of selection

methods.name: GetHeadPosition
methods.documentation: Returns a POSITION variable to allow access to the head of the selection list

signature.label: GetHeadPosition()
signature.documentation: Get position at head of list

methods.name: GetNext
methods.documentation: Returns the object at the current position AND a new POSITION pointing to the next item (or nil if at end). Note: returns two values.

signature.label: GetNext(pos: POSITION)
signature.documentation: Get object and advance position

parameters.label: pos
parameters.documentation: pos: POSITION - current position in list

methods.name: GetPrev
methods.documentation: Returns the object at the current position AND a new POSITION pointing to the previous item (or nil if at start). Note: returns two values.

signature.label: GetPrev(pos: POSITION)
signature.documentation: Get object and move position backward

parameters.label: pos
parameters.documentation: pos: POSITION - current position in list

methods.name: GetTailPosition
methods.documentation: Returns a POSITION variable to allow access to the tail (end) of the selection list

signature.label: GetTailPosition()
signature.documentation: Get position at tail of list

methods.name: GroupSelectionFinished
methods.documentation: Call this after using Add() or Remove() with group_add/group_remove set to true to update the application when finished modifying the selection

signature.label: GroupSelectionFinished()
signature.documentation: Signal that group selection operations are complete

methods.name: RemoveOnLayer
methods.documentation: Remove any objects from the selection which are on the layer with the passed id. The objects are just removed from the selection, not deleted.

signature.label: RemoveOnLayer(layer_id: UUID)
signature.documentation: Remove all objects on specified layer from selection

parameters.label: layer_id
parameters.documentation: layer_id: UUID - ID of layer

methods.name: Remove
methods.documentation: Remove the passed object from the selection. If removing many objects, set group_remove to true and call GroupSelectionFinished() when done.

signature.label: Remove(obj: CadObject, group_remove: boolean)
signature.documentation: Remove object from selection

parameters.label: obj
parameters.documentation: obj: CadObject - object to remove

parameters.label: group_remove
parameters.documentation: group_remove: boolean - if true, defer updates until GroupSelectionFinished() is called

methods.name: RemoveHead
methods.documentation: Remove the object at the front of the list and return it

signature.label: RemoveHead()
signature.documentation: Remove and return object from front of list

methods.name: RemoveTail
methods.documentation: Remove the object at the end of the list and return it

signature.label: RemoveTail()
signature.documentation: Remove and return object from end of list

methods.name: Transform
methods.documentation: Transform all objects in the selection by the passed transformation matrix

signature.label: Transform(xform: Matrix2D)
signature.documentation: Transform all selected objects

parameters.label: xform
parameters.documentation: xform: Matrix2D - transformation matrix to apply
